description: The file defines a Flutter widget for the Settings screen, providing UI elements for theme toggling, color preview, and data clearing functionality.

classes.name: SettingsScreen
classes.description: A StatelessWidget representing the user interface for application settings, including theme toggle, color preview, and data reset.

methods.name: _clearData
methods.description: Asynchronously prompts the user for confirmation and, if confirmed, clears sample data and resets settings via controllers.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the settings screen, including UI elements for theme toggle, color preview, and data reset.
